input_text:
Job Title: Senior Software Engineer - SpotOn Payments (Go/React)

Location: Austin, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
At SpotOn, we’re helping small businesses and restaurants compete and win with technology to better connect with their customers. Think marketing software, website development, e-commerce, reservations, online ordering, digital loyalty, review management, and both retail and restaurant point-of-sale (POS) solutions.

Recently, SpotOn Has

Raised $300M in Series F funding (valuing SpotOn at $3.6 Billion)Earned awards for Great Places to Work and Built In’s Best Places to WorkEarned award for Inc’s Fastest Growing Company in 2023Rated the top-rated point-of-sale (POS) for Restaurants, Bars, Retail, and Small Business by Capterra usersHelped local businesses succeed with technology and support to battle through the labor shortage while also helping their employees earn more. 

This year, we’re going even bigger—caring hard and moving fast down the path of high growth and positive impact.

That’s where you come in.

We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to design strong solutions and implement features within restaurant payment processing. Must excel in Golang and JavaScript, with React knowledge preferred. In this role you'll drive end-to-end feature development and deployment of the code between a customer swiping their credit card and our payment gateway. We are doing this with a Data-driven mindset using tools like Datadog for metrics and dashboard creation. We collaborate across teams and hope to bring someone in that enjoys mentoring junior engineers in the best practices of Golang and their careers in general. This is an amazing opportunity to innovate payment solutions and enhance user experiences. Join us in revolutionizing restaurant technology within a dynamic, collaborative environment.

Due to the nature of our upcoming work a successful candidate must have in production experience with Golang. If you haven't used Go for API development we will not be able to consider your candidacy at this time.

Responsibilities

Implement new features and fix bugs in Golang, React and JS frontendWrite MongoDB migrationsReview work from your teammates (Code Review)Demo work to stakeholdersParticipate in refinement, retrospectives, and stand-upsServe in on-call rotation for in 1 week shiftsTroubleshoot production issuesAssist other engineers (including mentorship of more junior engineers)

Qualifications

Research shows that women and members of underrepresented groups tend to apply to roles only when they check every box on a job description. We encourage you to apply if you meet the majority of qualifications and if this role is aligned with your career trajectory.

5 years of full-stack software development (Go and Javascript a must, preference for React)2 years of development experience with MongoDB2 years of experience working with TypescriptExperience with PostgreSQLGood command of spoken and written EnglishPrevious experience working in a small, fast-paced, agile teamComfortability pushing back on obstacles and voicing concerns

Nice To Haves

Familiarity with credit card processingAndroid / Kotlin experienceExperience leveraging GitHub Actions for deploymentsExperience working with TerraformRestaurant experience (server, host, cook…it helps to know the folks our software supports!)

Compensation

Our base pay range is $145,000 -$190,000 for this rolePlease note the salary range listed is just one component of a competitive compensation package which includes a company stock planOffers will be reflective of the candidate’s location and experience.

SpotOn is an equal employment opportunity employer. Qualified candidates are considered for employment without regard to race, religion, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, national origin, age, military or veteran status, disability, or any other characteristic protected by applicable law.

SpotOn is an e-verify company.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
